## Funciones

```{r}
test <- function(x) {
  if (!is.numeric(x)) return(0)
  return(2 * x)
}
```

```{r}
test("Hola")
```

```{r}
test(1)
```

```{r}
test <- function(x) {
  stopifnot(is.numeric(x))
  return(x)
}
```

```{r}
x <- 1
modify <- function(x) {
  x <- 2
  return(x)
}
modify(x)
x
```

```{r}
x <- 1
modify <- function(x, ...) {
  args <- list(...)
  return(args)
}
modify(x)
x
```

```{r}
testI <- function(x) {
  invisible(x)
}
testI("Hola")
x <- testI("Hola")
x
```

```{r}
a <- c(1, 3, 2)
b <- c(2, 0, 1)  # a y b de la misma dimensiÃ³n
a + b  # Para sumar los vectores a y b miembro a miembro
```

```{r}
library(microbenchmark)
```

```{r}
microbenchmark(
suma_vect = a + b, 
suma_for = {
  c <- NULL
  for (i in 1:length(a)) c <- c(c, a[i] + b[i]) }, times = 100)
```

## FOR

```{r}
a <- c(1, 2, 3)
b <- c(0, 1, 2)
for (i in 1:length(a)) {
  print(a[i] + b[i] )
  }
```

## WHILE

```{r}
counter <- 1
while (counter < 5) {
  print(counter)
  counter <- counter + 1
}

for (counter in 1:4) {
  print(counter)
}

number <- 2
while (number %% 2 == 0) {
  number <- floor(runif(1, 0, 10))
  print(number)
}

```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
while (TRUE) { 
  print(Sys.time())
  Sys.sleep(5)
}
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
repeat {
  print(Sys.time())
  Sys.sleep(5)
}
```

```{r}
library(microbenchmark)

microbenchmark( augusto = {
  if (4560 %% 3 == 0) {
  print(TRUE)
  }
  },
  beto = 4560 %% 3 == 0)

```
